articles.author: Alicia Wallace
articles.title: ‘It comes up on you fast:’ Scorching heat is crushing American businesses - CNN
articles.description: A 119-degree day in Phoenix hits like a blast of hot air from the oven with no relief in sight, and for a business owner like Lyn Thomas, there’s hardly any avoiding it.
articles.content:
